ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] wondering...
ygData.msgSnippet: The good thing about rogues is that they are non-casters so your skills will go up whether you re in a group or not.  doesn t matter if you solo or if you want
ygData.messageBody:
The good thing about rogues is that they are non-casters so your skills will go up whether you're in a group or not.  doesn't matter if you solo or if you want to group.   The rogue epic weapon is a rapier  - a piercing weapon, so you'll want piercing to be your main skill.  Particular in higher levels when you get backstab.  One of the rogue AA skills is called Assassinate, its a backstab that can do up to 30,000 damage on your opponent.  So keep that in mind.  With applying poison to your weapons you get bonus damage points as well.
 
Wulfric
 
One of my alts is a level 43 half elf rogue so I know where you're coming from.
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Gerry (Jerry)
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2005 2:31 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] wondering...

rogue solo at first or not? kinda want to know what weapon i need
too. what would be good. I'm the Nameless Server if u want to look me
up. Rogues name is Smallgurl. Laters all.
